name: Platformers Hell
description:
Can you escape the platformers hell ? Legend says it's shaped like a never ending platformer level... Maybe you can bribe someone with the coins scattered around the level to escape ?

Platformers Hell is a game created for the Potat0s Jam 4 (September 2020).

The theme was "Enfer" ("Hell" in english), so I decided to create a frustrating platformer that take place in hell.

Description

You are a famous 3D platformer game character, and like all of them, you died at one point in your game.
Except that this time you lost all your lives, and you ended up in hell.

Legend says that this hell was shapped to look like a level without ending, and with a lot of traps, but there must be an exit right ? Maybe you can bribe someone with those coins ?

It might be easier said than done, it looks like someone is watching you, and laugh at your failures for ethernity...

Tips

  • The game is hard and frustrating. (Ok this is not a tip)
  • The web version might be laggy/slow, just download the desktop version which obviously run flawlessly.
  • When you fall in the void you wont loose your progress, but you'll respawn at the begining of the level.
  • There are some traps everywhere in the level. Even if some can look like bugs, it's most likely traps put there on purpose. (Yes I'm evil)
  • If a box is in a anoying place just push it in the void, it will respawn at it's original place.
  • If a box is stuck against a fence at the end, just push it until it's not stuck. (Yes it works, I've tried)
  • Something really special happen when you finish the game with all the coins collected.

Controls

  • Move : WASD / ZQSD (both works)
  • Jump : Space (press longer to jump higher/further)
  • Sprint : Left Shift (maintain)
  • Crouch : C (useless but it's there)
  • Main menu : Escape
